articles.title: General Electric (GE): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Multi-Year Share Price Run
articles.mainIdea: General Electric (GE): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Multi-Year Share Price Run
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: General Electric (GE): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Multi-Year Share Price Run. General Electric (GE) has quietly added to its gains, with the stock edging up about 9% over the past week and roughly 8% in the past month, extending a strong year to date move. See our latest analysis for General Electric. At a share price of $316.75 and with an 87.88% year to date share price return alongside a 3 year total shareholder return above 500%, GE’s recent surge suggests momentum is still firmly building as investors reassess its growth and risk profile.
